item.title: Bury Them Deep
item.description: Bury Them Deep is a 1968 Italian Spaghetti Western film written and directed by Paolo Moffa and starring Craig Hill.

item.title: Sartana the Gravedigger
item.description: I am Sartana, Your Angel of Death is a 1969 Italian Western film directed by Giuliano Carnimeo and starring Gianni Garko. The film is presented on some DVD reissues under its German title, Sartana - Töten war sein täglich Brot.
